errors.keywords_category_is_missing: Keyword set must contain category, product name and colour.
errors.keywords_colour_is_missing: Specify colour keyword, or remove the field.
errors.keywords_duplicates: It looks like you have two items with the same product name. If a limit is set for this product and it is reached, the item will be skipped.
errors.keywords_empty: Add at least one set of keywords.
errors.keywords_item_is_missing: Specify product name and colour keywords, or remove the field.
errors.set_elapsed_time: The timer is set to elapsed time. Set the time you want to start the process or turn off the timer option.
errors.verification_value_max_length: CVV code must be less than 4 digits
errors.verification_value_min_length: The CVV code must be at least 3 digits long.
